Job Title: Marketing Automation Executive
 
Location: Goregaon West, Mumbai (Work From Office)
 
Working Days: Monday to Saturday (Sunday Off)
 
Salary Range: ₹3,60,000 – ₹4,20,000 per annum
 
About the Role: 
We are seeking a highly organized and tech-savvy Marketing Automation 
Executive to join our team. This role is ideal for someone who is 
passionate about marketing technology, automation workflows, and driving 
efficient communication processes using tools like Pabbly, Wait, Zapier, 
Mailmodo, and others. 
The ideal candidate will be responsible for planning, executing, and 
managing end-to-end automation of marketing communication across Email, 
WhatsApp, and Call workflows.

Key Responsibilities: 
● Design, build, and manage marketing automation workflows using tools 
such as Pabbly, Wait, Zapier, and Mailmodo 
● Implement drip email campaigns and WhatsApp automation for different 
customer journeys 
● Integrate communication tools with landing pages, forms, CRMs, and 
other web assets 
● Plan and execute automation rules to optimise lead nurturing, 
onboarding, and engagement 
● Set up triggers and actions between apps using automation platforms 
to ensure seamless data flow 
● Manage basic troubleshooting of automation workflows and 
communication delays 
● Collaborate with marketing, sales, and tech teams to support 
campaign goals through automation 
● Maintain and update contact lists, segmentation, and reporting using 
Excel and other CRM tools

Skills & Qualifications: 
● 1–2 years of experience in marketing automation or similar role 
● Strong hands-on knowledge of Pabbly, Zapier, Wait, or similar 
automation tools 
● Experience with email automation platforms such as Mailmodo, 
Sendinblue, MailerLite, etc. 
● Familiarity with drip email sequencing and customer journey mapping 
● Basic understanding of web development (HTML, forms, integrations) 
● Proficient in Excel and handling data exports, cleaning, and 
segmentation 
● Strong attention to detail, problem-solving mindset, and 
communication skills
 
Perks & Benefits: 
● Opportunity to work in a fast-paced, growth-driven environment 
● Exposure to the latest marketing tech tools and platforms 
● Be part of a collaborative and innovative team

Thanks and Regards,
Rachit Srivastava - 8887706986
